vclaim: During a December 2021 speech at a Turning Point USA conference, Fox News host Jesse Watters called for the assassination of Dr. Anthony Fauci.
title: Did Jesse Watters Call for Fauci’s Assassination?
subtitle: Now you're going for the kill shot. The kill shot with an ambush, deadly, Watters told attendees at a conservative political conference.
author: Dan Evon
